page.title: 16PLACENAMES IN WARWICK BRIDGE
page.content: The people round here have a terrible time deciding where they live. The area includes the{parishes}of Wetheral,Hayton and Heads Nook and some people use the{parish}name to say where they live. It is also common to use the name of an area which is not really a {village such as Burnrigg or Broadwath. In the village of Warwick Bridge there are others called Little Corby,Corby Hill and nearby Warwick on Eden also called Warwick Bank. If this wasnt enough, people use the name of the{estate}they live on,or even the{road.}These include Hurley Road,Millriggs,Cairn Crescent,Chapel Close,Homesteads,Eden Grange and more. So,a person could live in Warwick Bridge or Corby Hill or Burnrigg or Broadwath or Heads Nook and still only have one house.
